text: World of Goo 2 is a 2024 physics-based puzzle video game developed by independent game developers 2D Boy and Tomorrow Corporation. It is a story to World of Goo (2008). It was released on August 2, 2024, after being delayed from its original release date of May 23, 2024. == Gameplay == Like the thing that came before it, the game consists of building structures from goo balls in order to solve puzzles. == Development == Development of a sequel to World of Goo was reported on December 8, 2023. == References == Category:Video game sequels Category:Indie video games Category:Puzzle video games Category:Single-player video games Category:2024 video games Category:Windows games Category:macOS games Category:Linux games Category:Nintendo Switch games
title: World of Goo 2
